fields.description: The Microsoft Entra device ID of the Cloud PC.
fields.name: AadDeviceId

fields.description: The allotment name divides tenant licenses into smaller batches or groups that help restrict the number of licenses available for use in a specific assignment. When the provisioningType is dedicated, the allotment name is null. Read-only.
fields.name: AllotmentDisplayName

fields.description: The connection setting of the Cloud PC. Possible values: enableSingleSignOn. Read Only.
fields.name: ConnectionSetting

fields.description: The connectivity health check result of a Cloud PC, including the updated timestamp and whether the Cloud PC can be connected.
fields.name: ConnectivityResult

fields.description: The name of the geographical region where the Cloud PC is currently provisioned. For example, westus3, eastus2, and southeastasia. Read-only.
fields.name: DeviceRegionName

fields.description: The disaster recovery status of the Cloud PC, including the primary region, secondary region, and capability type. The default value is null that indicates that the disaster recovery setting is disabled. To receive a response with the disasterRecoveryCapability property, $select and $filter it by disasterRecoveryCapability/{subProperty} in the request URL. For more details, see Example 4: List Cloud PCs filtered by disaster recovery capability type. Read-only.
fields.name: DisasterRecoveryCapability

fields.description: The disk encryption applied to the Cloud PC. Possible values: notAvailable, notEncrypted, encryptedUsingPlatformManagedKey, encryptedUsingCustomerManagedKey, and unknownFutureValue.
fields.name: DiskEncryptionState

fields.description: The display name of the Cloud PC.
fields.name: DisplayName

fields.description: The date and time when the grace period ends and reprovisioning or deprovisioning happens. Required only if the status is inGracePeriod. The timestamp is shown in ISO 8601 format and Coordinated Universal Time (UTC). For example, midnight UTC on Jan 1, 2014 is 2014-01-01T00:00:00Z.
fields.name: GracePeriodEndDateTime

fields.description: Name of the OS image that's on the Cloud PC.
fields.name: ImageDisplayName

fields.description: The last login result of the Cloud PC. For example, { 'time': '2014-01-01T00:00:00Z'}.
fields.name: LastLoginResult

fields.description: The last modified date and time of the Cloud PC. The Timestamp type represents date and time information using ISO 8601 format and is always in UTC time. For example, midnight UTC on Jan 1, 2014, is 2014-01-01T00:00:00Z.
fields.name: LastModifiedDateTime

fields.description: The last remote action result of the enterprise Cloud PCs. The supported remote actions are: Reboot, Rename, Reprovision, Restore, Troubleshoot.
fields.name: LastRemoteActionResult

fields.description: The Intune device ID of the Cloud PC.
fields.name: ManagedDeviceId

fields.description: The Intune device name of the Cloud PC.
fields.name: ManagedDeviceName

fields.description: The Azure network connection that is applied during the provisioning of Cloud PCs.
fields.name: OnPremisesConnectionName

fields.description: The version of the operating system (OS) to provision on Cloud PCs. Possible values are: windows10, windows11, unknownFutureValue.
fields.name: OsVersion

fields.description: The results of every partner agent's installation status on Cloud PC.
fields.name: PartnerAgentInstallResults

fields.description: The power state of a Cloud PC. The possible values are: running, poweredOff, unknown. This property only supports shift work Cloud PCs.
fields.name: PowerState

fields.description: The provisioning policy ID of the Cloud PC.
fields.name: ProvisioningPolicyId

fields.description: The provisioning policy that is applied during the provisioning of Cloud PCs.
fields.name: ProvisioningPolicyName

fields.description: The type of licenses to be used when provisioning Cloud PCs using this policy. Possible values are: dedicated, shared, unknownFutureValue,sharedByUser, sharedByEntraGroup. You must use the Prefer: include-unknown-enum-members request header to get the following values from this evolvable enum: sharedByUser, sharedByEntraGroup. The default value is dedicated. CAUTION: The shared member is deprecated and will stop returning on April 30, 2027ï¼› in the future, use the sharedByUser member.
fields.name: ProvisioningType

fields.description: The service plan ID of the Cloud PC.
fields.name: ServicePlanId

fields.description: The service plan name of the Cloud PC.
fields.name: ServicePlanName

fields.description: The service plan type of the Cloud PC.
fields.name: ServicePlanType

fields.description: Indicates the detailed status associated with Cloud PC, including error/warning code, error/warning message, additionalInformation. For example, { 'code': 'internalServerError', 'message': 'There was an error during the Cloud PC upgrade. Please contact support.', 'additionalInformation': null }.
fields.name: StatusDetail

fields.description: The details of the Cloud PC status. For example, { 'code': 'internalServerError', 'message': 'There was an error during the Cloud PC upgrade. Please contact support.', 'additionalInformation': null }. This property is deprecated and will no longer be supported effective August 31, 2024. Use statusDetail instead.
fields.name: StatusDetails

fields.description: The account type of the user on provisioned Cloud PCs. Possible values are: standardUser, administrator, unknownFutureValue.
fields.name: UserAccountType

fields.description: The user principal name (UPN) of the user assigned to the Cloud PC.
fields.name: UserPrincipalName
